data.quote: Dreams are not those which comes while we are sleeping, but dreams are those which don't let you sleep before fulfilling them.
data.author: Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Sell this life for the next and you win both of them. Sell the next life for this and you lose both of them.
data.author: Hasan Al Basri

data.quote: Once you begin to see everything beautiful as only a reflection of Godâ€™s beauty, you will learn to love in the right way.
data.author: Yasmin Mogahed

data.quote: Forbidden love stories end at marriage, while true halal love stories begin at marriage and end with both entering paradise.
data.author: Abdulbary Yaha Bari

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.
data.author: Neil Gaiman

data.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
data.author: Socrates
